summary: Electronic Arts (EA) is an American video game company started in 1982 by Trip Hawkins. It was one of the first companies to make games for home computers and called its creators "software artists." At first, they made games with outside developers, but later started their own studios by buying other companies. Today, EA makes many popular game series like Battlefield, The Sims, and Star Wars. They also own big game studios like DICE and BioWare. In 2022, they launched their own PC game platform, EA App, to compete with Steam and Epic Games Store.
title: Electronic Arts
